title: A lagoon and beach close land (IDNH19)
details:
1.5 acres land with a under construction house
1.0 km to Hungama town
20.0 km to Tangalle town
Near by the land Birds Paradise
1.0 km to Kachchigal ara canal
1.0 km to next to paddy field
1.0 km to lagoon and exit to beach
Ideal for a villa,tourist hotel
